title: Extracting browser bookmarks
text:
Schema of how the bookmarks shall be stored:

source

BookmarkModel

 BookmarkModel (name:str, url:str, folder:str, date_added:datetime.date)

A model representing a bookmark.
Browser base model (to be inherited by all supported browsers)

source


ChromiumBrowser

 ChromiumBrowser (name:str, user_data_dirs:Dict[str,str],
                  default_bookmarks_filename:str,
                  operating_system:Optional[str]=None,
                  user_data_dir_path:Optional[pathlib.Path]=None)

Base class for interacting with web browsers’ bookmarks
Functions of class ChromiumBrowser must be over-ridden by child classes, if for some browser different handling of bookmarks is required :/
Chrome browser:

source


ChromeBrowser

 ChromeBrowser (name:str='Chrome',
                user_data_dirs:Dict[str,str]={'Windows':
                '~\\AppData\\Local\\Google\\Chrome\\User Data', 'Mac':
                '~/Library/Application Support/Google/Chrome', 'Linux':
                '~/.config/google-chrome'},
                default_bookmarks_filename:str='Bookmarks',
                operating_system:Optional[str]=None,
                user_data_dir_path:Optional[pathlib.Path]=None)

Base class for interacting with web browsers’ bookmarks
Edge browser:

source


EdgeBrowser

 EdgeBrowser (name:str='Microsoft Edge',
              user_data_dirs:Dict[str,str]={'Windows':
              '~\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\Edge\\User Data', 'Mac':
              '~/Library/Application Support/Microsoft Edge', 'Linux':
              '~/.config/microsoft-edge'},
              default_bookmarks_filename:str='Bookmarks',
              operating_system:Optional[str]=None,
              user_data_dir_path:Optional[pathlib.Path]=None)

Base class for interacting with web browsers’ bookmarks
Brave:

source


BraveBrowser

 BraveBrowser (name:str='Brave', user_data_dirs:Dict[str,str]={'Windows':
               '~\\AppData\\Local\\BraveSoftware\\Brave-Browser', 'Mac':
               '~/Library/Application Support/BraveSoftware/Brave-
               Browser', 'Linux': '~/.config/BraveSoftware/Brave-
               Browser'}, default_bookmarks_filename:str='Bookmarks',
               operating_system:Optional[str]=None,
               user_data_dir_path:Optional[pathlib.Path]=None)

Base class for interacting with web browsers’ bookmarks

source


get_bookmarks_from_browser

 get_bookmarks_from_browser
                             (browser_name:Literal['chrome','edge','brave'
                             ])

Extracts bookmarks from a specified browser.









Type
Details




browser_name
Literal
type of browser to extract bookmarks from currently supported: chrome, edge, brave


Returns
list
